title: Im a Windows Insider for some reason my phone no longer has preview ring selection. how do I make sure Im still on fast ring?
body: I'm a Windows Insider who has posted multiple questions to MS and in Windows communities regarding my issue with n/a. My phone settings no longer show a preview ring selection. My phone is one listed for the new Windows 10 update. What's the problem and how do I fix or confirm my account is under fast ring??? All it shows under settings is add/manage acct email now no ring choice. Someone please help!!!
